name: 林煜善
objective: This course is designed to improve your listening and reading competence in English. You should be able to learn how to enhance your listening for each part and your reading speed. After taking this course, you will be able to acquire the competence and useful strategies on dealing with each part of TOEIC test. You are also expected to get a score above 550. Please pay attention to the skills related to the TOEIC test. There will be two-round full skill in-class training by midterm and by final respectively. Should you have any questions, feel free to ask during the lecture.

W3.	Mar 08-14	Part 2: Question-Response

W7.	Apr 05-11	Part 6: Text Completion	4/5.6.7 days-off
W8.	Apr 12-18	Part 7: Reading Comprehension	
W9.	Apr 19-25	Midterm Exam	
W10.	Apr 26-May 02	Part 1: Photographs	
W11.	May 03-09	Part 2: Question-Response	
W12.	May 10-16	Part 3: Conversations	
W13.	May 17-23	Part 4: Talks	
W14.	May 24-30	Part 5: Incomplete Sentences

W18.	Jun 21-27	Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Midterm Exam: 25%
Final Exam: 25%
English Proficiency Test: 20%
Quizzes: 30%
materials: Longman Preparation Series for the TPEIC Test (Pearson)
